name: L2j acm
tagline: Account Manager use PHP and javascript technology to manage your l2j server user registration
body:
### Welcome to ACM for L2J server
Account Manager use PHP and javascript technology to manage your l2j server user registration.
This script is here since 03 december 2006

### Demo Website
http://heliosdaedalus.free.fr/act/

### Installation 

You must activate php_mysql library.

Edit config in config.php

You can create a new language just paste english.php in language folder and change the value in config file.


########################################
Parse db.sql (root directory) file on your database.
If you get this error when you try to create : Database problem: Account was not created. Please report this to the staff.. It seems you don't parse the previous code.
########################################

You need activate GD library for image validation.


In your mysql database, you need to grant for :

`accounts : select, insert, update`

`account_data : select, insert, delete`

For advanced use :

`CREATE USER 'acc'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password';`

`GRANT SELECT , INSERT , UPDATE ON `l2jdb_t1`.`accounts` TO 'acc'@'localhost';`

`GRANT SELECT , INSERT , DELETE ON `l2jdb_t1`.`account_data` TO 'acc'@'localhost';`

1. Unzip ACM on C:\wamp\www\acm
2. Edit C:\wamp\www\acm\config.php

`CONFIG::g()->ca('login_server', array(`

`                                    'hostname' => 'localhost',                  // login host database DB`

`                                    'user' => 'root',                           // login user`

`                                    'password' => '',                           // login password`

`                                    'database' => 'l2jdb_login'                     // login database name`

`                                ));`

3. Go to http://localhost/phpmyadmin/
4. Select the lineage database
5. Click to SQL link
6. Copy Paste db.sql (in main directory)
7. Go to http://localhost/acm/
8. If you get no error, script is running


`########################################`

`Check if you have set write rights on the cache folder.`

`########################################`


### Using Gmail to send email ?
1. Install PHP with extensions for MYSQL, GD2, and OpenSSL
2. Enable POP access on the gmail account being used.
3. php.ini changes

`[mail function]`

`; For Win32 only.`

`SMTP = tls://smtp.gmail.com`

`smtp_port = 465`

 
`; For Win32 only.`

`sendmail_from = myemail@gmail.com`

4. config.php changes;

`CONFIG::g()->cb('email_smtp_use', true);                                            // Set to true if you want use an smtp server`

`CONFIG::g()->cs('email_smtp_address', 'tls://smtp.gmail.com');                      // Address of the smtp server`

`CONFIG::g()->ci('email_smtp_port', 465);                                            // Port of the smtp server`

`CONFIG::g()->cs('email_smtp_login', 'myemail@gmail.com');                           // login of the smtp server if you need authentication`

`CONFIG::g()->cs('email_smtp_passwor', 'mypassword');                                // password of the smtp server if you need authentication`

`CONFIG::g()->cs('email_smtp_domain', '');                                           // domain of your host`

### Using interlude ?
`
CONFIG::g()->cb('core_interlude', true);                         // If you are using interlude database set to true
`
